lead_paragraph: A government source said that the police had arrested eight gunmen believed to be affiliated with the Islamic State of Iraq, a militant organization connected to Al Qaeda in Mesopotamia.
snippet: A government source said that the police had arrested eight gunmen believed to be affiliated with the Islamic State of Iraq, a militant organization connected to Al Qaeda in Mesopotamia.

headline.main: Iraqi Forces Storm a Church With Hostages in a Day of Bloodshed
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Forces Storm a Church With Hostages in a Day of Bloodshed

byline.contributor: Iraqi employees of The New York Times contributed reporting.
